---
name: planning-backlog-created-date
interactive: true
description: Collects or generates the created date for a backlog item. Use this skill to prompt for or generate the created date as part of planning workflows. Supports interactive mode for user input.
---

argument-hint:
/backlog-created-date: |
Parameters: none
Action: Prompt the user to enter or confirm the created date, validate input, and return the value.
Example: /backlog-created-date
